section.title: buf_size (integer)
section.para: Maximum size of the XML buffer.

section.title: xml_ns (str)
section.para: Register xml namespace prefix. Parameter value must have the format: 'prefix=uri'.
This is useful when it is needed to access XML documents that specify xmlns without prefix, which is not XML-standard compliant, but it comes with SIP SIMPLE presence bodies.

example.title: Set xml_ns parameter
example.programlisting:
... modparam("xmlops", "xml_ns", "pidf=urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf") ... $xml(x=>doc) = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" entity="sip:test@mydomain.com"> <tuple id="86ae65b7-42de-4399-b635-295caad13aac"> <status><basic>none</basic></status> </tuple> </presence>';
xinfo("status: $xml(x=>xpath:/pidf:presence/pidf:tuple/pidf:status/pidf:basic)\n"); ...

section.para: Pseudo-variable for XML document operations using xpath syntax. For more see the Pseudo-Variables Cookbook.
